00002 #include <unistd.h>
00003 #include <sys/types.h>
00004 #include <sys/quota.h>

00006 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00007 {
00008 //Get current user ID
00009 int uid = getuid();
00010 const char* block_device = argv[1];
00011 //if_dqblk structure
00012 struct if_dqblk {                     
00013             u_int64_t dqb_bhardlimit;     
00014             u_int64_t dqb_bsoftlimit;     
00015             u_int64_t dqb_curspace;       
00016             u_int64_t dqb_ihardlimit;     
00017             u_int64_t dqb_isoftlimit;     
00018             u_int64_t dqb_curinodes;      
00019             u_int64_t dqb_btime;          
00020             u_int64_t dqb_itime;          
00021             u_int32_t dqb_valid;          
00022     };            
00023 
00024 struct if_dqblk dq;
00025     //Get quota information
00026     if (quotactl(QCMD(Q_GETQUOTA, USRQUOTA), block_device, uid, (caddr_t) & dq)) {
00027         perror("quotactl");
00028         return 1;
00029     } else {
00030         //Display quota information
00031         printf("Device: %s\n", block_device);
00032         printf
00033             ("Current space:  %7.1qu \tSoft limit: %7.1qu  \tHard limit: %7.1qu \tGrace period: %qu\n",
00034              dq.dqb_curspace, dq.dqb_bsoftlimit, dq.dqb_bhardlimit,
00035              dq.dqb_btime);
00036 }
00037 
00038 return 0;
00039 }
